page.title: 02INDUSTRY
page.content: The industry of this area is mainly{ {manufacturing}and{distribution}/{ {warehousing}. There are at least 12 manufacturing firms,11 of which employ about 318 people; and at least 22 distribution firms employing about 563 people.There is an{extractive}industry employing 12 people. The{manufacturing}firms make items { from special steel fabrications, compressors, conveyors, and printing rollers to hinges and keep-fit apparatus. The{distribution}firms distribute items including cranes, diggers, excavators, fork-lift trucks, agricultural machines, special tool- making steel,office equipment,medicine and food. The{extractive}industry is reclaiming coal by washing it from an old slag-heap and reshaping the heap to become a 9-hole golf course.
